About ServerLogix
ServerLogix is a team of IT Professionals. Our team is based out of Toronto, Canada with servers spread throughout the US and Canada. We are dedicated to your needs and will be here for you 24/7 for any of your needs. Our vision for ServerLogix is to make enterprise level hosting accessible and affordable. We are currently in the process on building new partnerships to open additional locations in Montreal, Las Angeles, Chicago, and Pheonix.
